term.title: dilute solution

item.text: Solution in which the sum of amount fractions of all the solutes is small compared to 1.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 533. 'Standard quantities in chemical thermodynamics. Fugacities, activities and equilibrium constants for pure and mixed phases (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 535 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030533)
